title: 'Happiest Season'
description:
TV Concierge returns as Bill Simmons, Juliet Litman, and Kate Halliwell sit down to discuss the breakout rom-com of the holidays, 'Happiest Season,' now streaming on Hulu.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
